name: Delineation Keep
description:
made in 72 hours for Gutter Jam 3

DELINEATION KEEP

You have entered the sacred halls of Delineation Keep.

To prove yourself to the 5 Gods of the Hallowed Shapes, you must bear sword and shield and pass a feat of strength.

Fight off waves of enemies summoned by the Gods and face your ultimate judgement. Are you worthy of ascension? Or will you linger these halls for eternity?

My Twitter

Music provided by MobiusDisco

There is a noticeable bug that will occur while riding a coffin and two happen to collide. I am aware of the bug but there is no jam time left for me to fix it. It's not completely gamebreaking, but it can possibly end your run if you encounter it.
